scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start --workspace=home-assignment" "npm run start --workspace=github-info" "npm run start --workspace=shell"
scripts.build: concurrently "npm run build --workspace=mfe-common" "npm run build --workspace=home-assignment" "npm run build --workspace=github-info" "npm run build --workspace=shell"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --workspace=mfe-common" "npm run dev --workspace=home-assignment" "npm run dev --workspace=github-info" "npm run dev --workspace=shell"
